-Fixed the 3 major crashes
-Added a video preview

-Reduced frequency of showing Ads.

-Improved Metadata

- Ask the user for IDFA consent.

- Better support for iOS 14.

- Fixed Restore button “success” error
- Changed App Icon

- تحسين عملية المسح، لمسح الرموز الصغيرة جدًا أو البعيدة

- Improved scanning process
- Automatic Removal of duplicates from history
- Fixed lag in navigation
